languages.text: "Если это не взаимно — скажите, я пойму. В противном случае — я приношу извинения за необдуманные слова и хочу забрать их назад".
"If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."
languages.original_text: "Если это не взаимно — скажите, я пойму. В противном случае — я приношу извинения за необдуманные слова и хочу забрать их назад".

traits.locale_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."
"If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."
"If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."
"If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."
"If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

languages.text: 「もしあなたの気持ちが同じではないなら、そう言ってください―受け止めます。もし同じなら、先ほどの軽率な言葉を謝って、取り消したいと思います」
languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

traits.locale_text: 「もしあなたの気持ちが同じではないなら、そう言ってください―受け止めます。もし同じなら、先ほどの軽率な言葉を謝って、取り消したいと思います」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr nicht auch so empfindet, sagt es mir – ich werde es verstehen. Falls doch, entschuldige ich mich für meine vorherigen überstürzten Worte und nehme sie zurück."
languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr nicht auch so empfindet, sagt es mir – ich werde es verstehen. Falls doch, entschuldige ich mich für meine vorherigen überstürzten Worte und nehme sie zurück."

languages.text: « Si vous ne partagez pas mes sentiments, je comprendrai tout à fait. Et dans le cas contraire, je tiens à vous présenter mes excuses pour avoir été si dur envers vous, je retire tout ce que j'ai dit. »
languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous ne partagez pas mes sentiments, je comprendrai tout à fait. Et dans le cas contraire, je tiens à vous présenter mes excuses pour avoir été si dur envers vous, je retire tout ce que j'ai dit. »

languages.text: «Si no siente lo mismo, dígamelo y lo entenderé. Pero si me corresponde, entonces me disculpo por mi arrebato de antes y retiro mis palabras».
languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

traits.locale_text: «Si no siente lo mismo, dígamelo y lo entenderé. Pero si me corresponde, entonces me disculpo por mi arrebato de antes y retiro mis palabras».

languages.text: “如果你并不这么想，请告诉我，我能理解。如果你也这么想，那我想为我之前的鲁莽言论道歉，收回那些不合适的话。”
languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

traits.locale_text: “如果你并不这么想，请告诉我，我能理解。如果你也这么想，那我想为我之前的鲁莽言论道歉，收回那些不合适的话。”

languages.text: "Karşılık hissetmiyorsanız söyleyin, anlarım. Hissediyorsanız da pervasızca sözlerimi geri almak isterim."
languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."

traits.locale_text: "Karşılık hissetmiyorsanız söyleyin, anlarım. Hissediyorsanız ise evvelce ettiğim pervasızca sözleri geri almak isterim."

languages.original_text: "If you do not feel the same, tell me — I will understand. If you do, then I want to apologise for my rash words before and take them back."
